articles.author: Josh Campbell, Elizabeth Wolfe, Rosa Flores, Andy Rose
articles.title: 2 American survivors of deadly Mexico kidnapping are being treated in US hospital, officials say, as bodies of 2 killed are examined. Here's what we know - CNN
articles.description: Two Americans have returned to the US from Mexico and are being treated at a hospital after an armed kidnapping left two of their friends dead and spurred a days-long search for the US travelers who had crossed the border for a medical procedure, officials sa…

articles.title: Bank of America CEO says 'we are capitalists' as anti-ESG critics gain steam - Reuters
articles.description: Bank of America Corp's (BAC.N) Chief Executive Officer Brian Moynihan had a clear message for shareholders on Tuesday: "We are capitalists."
articles.content:
NEW YORK , March 7 (Reuters) - Bank of America Corp's (BAC.N) Chief Executive Officer Brian Moynihan had a clear message for shareholders on Tuesday: "We are capitalists."
